Hi @monacv, apologies for the slow reply. In order to run the x86_64 executable, you should have in the same path a `linux_exec_Data` folder, that can be downloaded along with the simulator. You need the x86_64 file and the data folder to be in the same path in order to be able to run the simulator.

Please let me know if there are more issues
Actually, I realized that the unity zip did not have the `Data` folder required. I just the zip file, which should be running ok. Thanks for the note!
